text:
[Verse]
Walking alone at night
Under the streetlights glow
Heartbeats in the city hum
Where did everyone go

[Verse 2]
Shadows play on the wall
Echoes in empty space
Neon signs flash above
I'm lost in this place

[Chorus]
Under the streetlights
Dancing in the dark
Under the streetlights
Looking for a spark

[Verse 3]
Footsteps echo a song
Rhythms we left behind
Memories linger on
Of a different time

[Bridge]
Lost in the night’s embrace
Seeking out a friendly face
City never sleeps they say
But I feel alone today

[Chorus]
Under the streetlights
Dancing in the dark
Under the streetlights
Looking for a spark
title: Under the Streetlights
